column4: I need some serious help with Docky, I want it to intellihide, but I'm doing this from a MadBox OS (ubuntu with openbox) and it just does not seem to work out, can I do this the harder way ?
We do not support unofficial derivatives, sorry.
Maybe they have their own channel?
Also do you have xcompmgr enabled? Might need that for those fancy docks...
Well, or any other compositing manager.
Good luck, because I don't have any suggestions but that.
